description: AI-powered Ad Management tool structures and optimizes Google Ads campaigns in a few minutes, just like a senior PPC specialist. Start to build, optimize and scale your business today.
title: Ad Management tool for Google Ads campaigns - Optimyzee
introduction: Optimyzee is an AI-powered Ad Management tool that structures and optimizes Google Ads campaigns in minutes, providing the same results as a senior PPC specialist. It offers features like Search Campaign Structure Power, Keyword Planner, RSA Builder, and Real Time Ads Validation.
targetPeople: Marketers, Marketing Agencies, Business Retail Owners

faqs.question: Who is Optimyzee for?
faqs.answer: Optimyzee is for marketers, marketing agencies, and business retail owners who want to optimize Google Ads campaigns efficiently and effectively.

faqs.question: Does Optimyzee offer a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes, Optimyzee offers a 7-day free trial for users to experience its AI-powered features.
